original: Sappītikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sa ppītikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa ppītikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Appītikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: appītikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sappītikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sappītikaṁ kusalañca appītikaṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: sappītikam kusalañca appītikam kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sappītikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Sappītikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sappītikam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sappītikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Appītikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: appītikam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sappītikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sappītikaṁ akusalañca appītikaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko akusalo dhammo
analyzed: sappītikam akusalañca appītikam akusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sappītikaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
